doc.name: FmvState
doc.description: A Formal Method Verification (FMV) State. It supports graphical specification generation for safety or reachability analysis.
doc.author: Chihhong Patrick Cheng
doc.property: A boolean parameter indicating that this state is a risk state. The default value is false.
A boolean parameter indicating whether this state is a reachability analysis state. The default value is false.
